titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4939) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-496, by Mr. Cole (OK).
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 191.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 857.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - Mr. Cole moved the previous question on the adoption of H. Res. 857 and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Slaughter demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 204 - 165 (Roll no. 255).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/12/2006--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4939 (Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Hurricane Recovery, 2006).
